text: Wham! was an English new romantic/soft rock band, whose sound combines new vave and soul or funk, but also in some early songs adds rap and in "The Edge of Heaven" adds a touch of hard rock.Wham! . www.simplyeighties.com. Retrieved December 31, 2021. It was created in 1981 by George Michael and Andrew Ridgeley. They released their first single in 1982.When was Whams first hit?. boardgamestips.com.
